docs.text: 概览 常用工具学习整理及实践备忘 目录： MkDocs&Github Pages搭建文档网站
docs.title: 概览

docs.text: 常用工具学习整理及实践备忘 目录： MkDocs&Github Pages搭建文档网站
docs.title: 概览

docs.text: 1. 简介 日常学习和工作中养成记笔记的好习惯对自我成长帮助巨大。用自己的语言去阐释学习的知识并输出是检验我们对知识点理解是否透彻的最佳方法。把我们记录的知识点通过个人文档网站的方式分享给读者既可以确保笔记质量又能收到反馈，加深自己对知识点的理解。 个人采用markdown记笔记，并借助 MkDocs+github 分享发布自己的笔记。这里主要记录在已有 markdown 笔记的情况下，用 MkDocs+github 搭建文档网站的方法。 2. 环境搭建 2.1 环境安装 Mkdocs 是一个python库，可将markdown文本生成html网页。 pip install mkdocs pip install mkdocs-material pip install mkdocs-material-extensions 2.2 基本使用 mkdocs new wjgarnett.github.io cd ./wjgarnett.github.io mkdocs serve #开启网页服务，主要用来进行本地实时调试 mkdocs build #构建html网页 mkdocs --help git init git add . touch README.md .gitignore #对应文件中添加相应内容 touch .gitignore #忽略site/目录 ... git pull -u origin master mkdocs gh-deploy #发布到internet，可通过2.3的自动化方式替代 2.3 github自动化构建网页设置 mkdocs gh-deploy 命令式发布的方式比较繁琐，我们可以在对应 github 的仓库的 action 选项里设置自动化构建工作流。 # This is a basic workflow to help you get started with Actions name: public site # Controls when the workflow will run on: # Triggers the workflow on push or pull request events but only for the main branch push: branches: [ master ] pull_request: branches: [ master ] # Allows you to run this workflow manually from the Actions tab workflow_dispatch: # A workflow run is made up of one or more jobs that can run sequentially or in parallel jobs: # This workflow contains a single job called "build" build: # The type of runner that the job will run on runs-on: ubuntu-latest # Steps represent a sequence of tasks that will be executed as part of the job steps: # Checks-out your repository under $GITHUB_WORKSPACE, so your job can access it - uses: actions/checkout@v3 - name: Install mkdocs run: | python -m pip install mkdocs==1.2.2 python -m pip install mkdocs-material==7.1.11 python -m pip install mkdocs-material-extensions==1.0.1 python -m pip install mike==1.0.1 - name: Create html run: mkdocs build - name: Public uses: peaceiris/actions-gh-pages@v3 with: github_token: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }} publish_dir: ./site 3. MkDocs 使用入门 参考官方资料： Getting Started User Guide 先简单过一下并实践下，用的过程中多查看即可。 参考资料 https://zhongshsh.github.io/BlogInOF/util/20220307-mkdocs.html 用Mkdocs发布你的网站 MkDocs官网
docs.title: MkDocs&Github Pages搭建文档网站

docs.text: 日常学习和工作中养成记笔记的好习惯对自我成长帮助巨大。用自己的语言去阐释学习的知识并输出是检验我们对知识点理解是否透彻的最佳方法。把我们记录的知识点通过个人文档网站的方式分享给读者既可以确保笔记质量又能收到反馈，加深自己对知识点的理解。 个人采用markdown记笔记，并借助 MkDocs+github 分享发布自己的笔记。这里主要记录在已有 markdown 笔记的情况下，用 MkDocs+github 搭建文档网站的方法。
docs.title: 1. 简介

docs.text: Mkdocs 是一个python库，可将markdown文本生成html网页。 pip install mkdocs pip install mkdocs-material pip install mkdocs-material-extensions
docs.title: 2.1 环境安装

docs.text: mkdocs new wjgarnett.github.io cd ./wjgarnett.github.io mkdocs serve #开启网页服务，主要用来进行本地实时调试 mkdocs build #构建html网页 mkdocs --help git init git add . touch README.md .gitignore #对应文件中添加相应内容 touch .gitignore #忽略site/目录 ... git pull -u origin master mkdocs gh-deploy #发布到internet，可通过2.3的自动化方式替代
docs.title: 2.2 基本使用

docs.text: mkdocs gh-deploy 命令式发布的方式比较繁琐，我们可以在对应 github 的仓库的 action 选项里设置自动化构建工作流。 # This is a basic workflow to help you get started with Actions name: public site # Controls when the workflow will run on: # Triggers the workflow on push or pull request events but only for the main branch push: branches: [ master ] pull_request: branches: [ master ] # Allows you to run this workflow manually from the Actions tab workflow_dispatch: # A workflow run is made up of one or more jobs that can run sequentially or in parallel jobs: # This workflow contains a single job called "build" build: # The type of runner that the job will run on runs-on: ubuntu-latest # Steps represent a sequence of tasks that will be executed as part of the job steps: # Checks-out your repository under $GITHUB_WORKSPACE, so your job can access it - uses: actions/checkout@v3 - name: Install mkdocs run: | python -m pip install mkdocs==1.2.2 python -m pip install mkdocs-material==7.1.11 python -m pip install mkdocs-material-extensions==1.0.1 python -m pip install mike==1.0.1 - name: Create html run: mkdocs build - name: Public uses: peaceiris/actions-gh-pages@v3 with: github_token: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }} publish_dir: ./site
